item.title: Line Endings Are Dumb
item.author: buchananlab@gmail.com (statstools.com)
item.description: I have happily acquired a new Mac Book (yay!) and a new work computer (Windows). So, I've been making One Drive exceedingly unhappy moving GBs of file from one to another. As I was working on reconnecting my GitHub repositories to the files, I was trying to understand why several of my repos were saying I had a bunch of file changes but nothing in the files themselves had changed. I noticed they were mostly .
